entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Owen Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:45 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 09:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 1.7°C
Wind: E 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Risk of freezing rain over higher terrain early this morning. Fog patches dissipating late this afternoon. Amount 5 mm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain or snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow or ice pellets near midnight. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
